Reference

All functions

GetStatsTockyLocus()

Perform Statistical Tests for Tocky Locus Analysis

Locus_to_colour()

Convert Timer Angle Data into color code

TockyLocus()

Calculate Tocky Locus using Timer Angle

TockyLocusLegend()

Generate Tocky Locus Legend For a Plot

plotAngleDensity()

Plot Density of Angles by Group Using Ridge Plots

plotTockyLocus()

Produce scatter plots of percentages of cells in each Tocky Locus.

plotTockyLocusLegend()

Plot Coloured Tocky Locus Legend

plot_tocky_locus()

Generate basic QC plots for Tocky data (Timer-Blue vs Timer-Red 2d plots)
